{{Stub}} {{Infobox location poe2 | game = lax3 | map = LAX3 Hall of Reconfiguration.png | caption_map = | name = Hall of Reconfiguration | type = Dungeon | description = | exits = The Enclosures;The Assembly of Echoes | sub_locations = | merchant = | innkeeper = | inhabitants = | main_location = Temple of Revelation | plants = | expected_level= 18 | grants_xp = yes | override_xp = | is_crit_path = no | can_camp = yes | zone_id = zn_lax03_02_menagerie | internalname = AR_LAX03_0204_Collections_Lower | guid = f82790e3-2fd9-4e8f-a900-d885b542715a | lsc = | icon = }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{lax3}}. ==Background== ==Points of interest== * The table in the Alcove of Incision to the north-west contains a [[Fungicide]] and a Fungus. You can pick up the Fungus and get 3x [[Huona Mahe]]. Alternatively, If you decide to convert the Fungicide to [[Fungal Fertilizer]] with [[Alchemy]] 17 and use that on the Fungus you will get 5x [[Huona Mahe]] instead. Check the corresponding pages for more uses. ==Characters==
== Loot == * [[Scourge of Bezzello]]: Dropped by the frightened child, northeastern room. * [[Ooblit]]: In a cage in the Waiting room, just northwestern to the Screaming Pit. * [[Lucero]]: In a cage in the Waiting room, just northwestern to the Screaming Pit. * [[Fungicide]]: Found on the chemistry table in the Alcove of Incision, northwestern room. Can be converted into [[Fungal Fertilizer]] with [[Alchemy]] 17 (party assisted). * [[Advanced Wistful Stargazing]]: in the Alcove of Incision, bookshelf on northeastern wall.
title: Hall of Reconfiguration
